arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic boss on injury sustained by on-loan Leicester City winger - 'a bad one'
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney admits he fears the worst over the knee injury that saw on-loan Leicester City winger Silko Thomas stretchered from the field midway through the first half of Wigan Athletic's 1-1 draw with Lincoln City.

arts.ttl: Paul Kendrick's player ratings - Wigan Athletic v Lincoln City - ‘Strong in the tackle and got forward at every opportunity...'
arts.sum: Paul Kendrick runs the rule over the Wigan Athletic side that were held to a 1-1 by Lincoln City at the Brick Community Stadium and delivers his report card.

arts.ttl: James Collins strikes late to earn Lincoln a point at Wigan
'Referee let us down' - Wigan Athletic boss pulls no punches after late Lincoln City leveller
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney felt his Wigan Athletic side were 'let down' by referee John Mulligan after Lincoln City took advantage of an 88th-minute penalty to steal a point at the Brick.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic denied vital victory by late, late Lincoln City penalty
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic saw two precious points slip through their fingers as Lincoln City stole a point thanks to a controversial 88th-minute penalty.

arts.ttl: Team news: Wigan Athletic v Lincoln City
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney has selected his Wigan Athletic side for Saturday’s League One clash against Lincoln City at the Brick Community Stadium

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic: Four changes in our expected team v Lincoln City!
arts.sum: Paul Kendrick runs the rule over the Wigan Athletic squad and predicts the 11 men who Shaun Maloney will select to start against Lincoln City at the Brick Community Stadium on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic chief makes 'permanent move' statement ahead of transfer deadline
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney has revealed the sale of Thelo Aasgaard means there 'might be some more room now' to bring in a player - and on a permanent basis.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic v Lincoln City injury and team news as 11 out and 2 doubts
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic are in EFL League One action on Saturday when they host Lincoln City at the DW Stadium.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic Academy product joins MK Dons from St Johnstone
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic Academy product Jack Sanders has joined League Two outfit MK Dons from Scottish Premiership outfit St Johnstone.
